page.title: 06Boughton Estate, Kettering
page.content: Boughton is a highly efficient and well managed estate and the focal point of an active rural community. The Estate employs many able people and technicians who are expert in their various fields and has much specialised equipment for the various activities it undertakes. Estate management is concerned with food and timber production, nature conservation, the protection of the environment, sport, recreation and public amenity. The Estate Office is situated in the village of Weekley and it is here that the various activities are co-ordinated under the direction of the Agent. Conservation of a number of villages has been a priority. Without the financial backing of the Estate and its skilled craftsmen some of our national heritage might have been lost.
